text: Egh Israelia dughiar kurar kamɨn aven ikɨva, ighiar kam gɨnɨghnɨghvɨra ikɨ a bangam. Eghtɨ men ovavir boriba uaghan, a gɨfogh a bangam. Eghtɨ ighiamɨn akaba men arazir kurar me amiziba, men akakagh dar gun me mɨkɨmam. Kɨ tɨghar me inigh nguazir kɨ me danɨngasa akam akɨrizir kamɨn aven mangam, egha kɨ men nɨghnɨzir kurabagh fogha gɨfa.”
